strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we deliver any satellite training or outreach programs in rural or remote communities this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, which communities did we serve, and what type of programming did we deliver in each?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Approximately how many participants took part in each rural or remote delivery?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, what limited our ability to deliver rural or remote programming this period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we work with any community organisations or partners to deliver or refer into community programs this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, which organisations did we partner with and what communities do they primarily serve?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, approximately how many participants came into our programs through these partners this period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, are there partner organisations we should pursue relationships with in future periods?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we deliver any culturally specific or culturally inclusive community programs this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, what were these programs, which cultural communities were they intended to serve, and where did they take place?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: What feedback did we receive from participants or partners about these culturally inclusive programs?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, which cultural communities or groups should we prioritise engaging in the future?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we deliver community programs that specifically reduced geographic barriers to participation this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, what programs did we deliver (e.g., localised classes, mobile programs, partnerships) and in which communities?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: What changes did you observe in access (easier transportation, closer venues, more participation from specific areas)?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, what geographic or logistical constraints are currently limiting access?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we provide any free or sponsor-paid tickets to community members or groups this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, approximately how many tickets did we provide and to which community groups or partners?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, what outcomes did you observe (new audiences, deeper relationships, repeat attendance)?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, what funding, partnership, or operational barriers are limiting free or sponsor-paid tickets?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: Did we perform anywhere throughout the province this reporting period (community performances, pop-ups, or tours)?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If yes, where did we perform, what was the context, and approximately how many people attended each location?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: How did we use these performances to build relationships, promote programs, or increase access to tickets and classes?

strategic_pillar: Expand Accessibility & Engagement Through Inclusive Programs
question_text: If not, were there provincial opportunities we considered but could not pursue this period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: Did we launch targeted marketing campaigns for Alberta Ballet recreational classes this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If yes, which campaigns did we run (channels, audiences, key messages)?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: What measurable results did these campaigns generate (inquiries, website visits, registrations, engagement)?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If not, what prevented us from running targeted campaigns this period (budget, timing, capacity, creative)?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: Did we see growth in new or returning students in Alberta Ballet recreational classes this reporting period compared to a typical month?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If yes, how many NEW recreational students registered this period (best estimate is fine)?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If yes, how many RETURNING recreational students continued or re-registered this period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If there was no growth or a decline, what do you think contributed (competition, schedule, pricing, awareness)?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: Did we intentionally target or reach underrepresented or equity-deserving groups in marketing for recreational classes this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If yes, which groups did we focus on (e.g., newcomers, Indigenous families, racialised communities, low-income neighbourhoods) and what tactics did we use?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If not, what opportunities or partners could help us reach more diverse students in future periods?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: Did we enrol any self-disclosing diverse students (e.g., newcomers, Indigenous, racialised, low-income, disability) in recreational classes this reporting period?

question_text: If yes, how many self-disclosing diverse students enrolled or continued this period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If not, what might be limiting access for these students (location, cost, transportation, awareness, cultural barriers)?

question_text: Did we offer discounted or sponsored performance tickets to recreational students or their families this reporting period?

strategic_pillar: Boost Enrollment & Engagement in AB Classes
question_text: If not, what prevented us from offering discounted or sponsored tickets this period?
